mapper.select: select count(*) from ms_library_member a where 1 = 1
mapper.insert: insert into ms_library_member ( member_code, member_name, member_type, member_identity_no, member_status, start_date, end_date, annual_fee_status, created_date, changed_date, created_by, changed_by, suspend_date, end_suspend_date ) values ( #{memberCode}, #{memberName}, #{memberType}, #{memberIdentityNo}, #{memberStatus}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{annualFeeStatus}, #{createdDate}, #{changedDate}, #{createdBy}, #{changedBy}, #{suspendDate}, #{endSuspendDate} )
mapper.update: update ms_library_member set member_code = #{memberCode}, member_name = #{memberName}, member_type = #{memberType}, member_identity_no = #{memberIdentityNo}, member_status = #{memberStatus}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, annual_fee_status = #{annualFeeStatus}, changed_date = #{changedDate}, suspend_date = #{suspendDate}, end_suspend_date = #{endSuspendDate}, changed_by = #{changedBy} where id = #{pkLibraryMember}
